DataElement.preferredName: Hearing Loss Without Hearing Aid Requirement Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not a patient has hearing loss that does not require a hearing aid or hearing aids.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hearing Loss Without Hearing Aid Requirement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A partial or complete loss of hearing in one or both ears. It is classified as conductive, sensory, or central._Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone._A battery-powered electronic device designed to improve hearing. Most are worn in or behind the ear._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A partial or complete loss of hearing in one or both ears. It is classified as conductive, sensory, or central.

Concepts.definition: A partial or complete loss of hearing in one or both ears. It is classified as conductive, sensory, or central.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.:A battery-powered electronic device designed to improve hearing. Most are worn in or behind the ear.:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
A battery-powered electronic device designed to improve hearing. Most are worn in or behind the ear.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not established beyond doubt; still undecided or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Not established beyond doubt; still undecided or unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.: A means of finding a solution to a problem, or a means of finding agreement or harmony.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A means of finding a solution to a problem, or a means of finding agreement or harmony.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.

The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
